external_games.name: Shin Megami Tensei: The Reborn World
external_games.url: https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/Shin Megami Tensei: The Reborn World

name: Shin Megami Tensei: The Reborn World
summary: A fan game based off of Shin Megami Tensei main series ported from VX. Has 2 story modes: a 24-30h main story, and a 6 hour side story with basic demon recruitment. This is a one man project.
